Articles.Content:
Hey KSP Team,

I didnÂ´t knew where I have to put this Topic, I hope itÂ´s alright here.

I wanted to report a little writing Mistake in the Vehicle Assembly Bulding.

At the beginning of the Tutorial (the second Tutorial pop-up) it says: 'Command Mocule' insteed of 'Command Module'.

I know its just a little mistake but you guys want to make a serious game, and grammar is a important thing than.

Excuse my bad English, cause im from Germany, but I hope I could help a bit.

Nice greets.
